content:
本件保存
會員委 設建 庫 水 門石 SHIHMEN DEVELOPMENT COMMISSION
+
SDC - 5472
July 27, 1962
Mr. K. T. Li, Secretary-General Council for United States Aid 118 Hwaining Street Taipei, Taiwan
Subject:
GSA Surplus Equipment
Dear Mr. Li:
Please refer to the attached copy of Mr. G. C. Johnson's letter MK-1569 dated July 25, 1962 regarding the above subject. 140.112.213.82
It is recommended by MKA that the equipment as listed in Mr. Johnson's letter are required by the Shihmen Project for meeting the present construction requirement. We, therefore, request your immediate arrangement with AID/M to allocate these equipment to Shihmen Project as we may save the purchase of additional unit from States side.
Your action on the above will be highly appreciated.
好 Q
Very truly yours, SHIIMEN DEVELOPMENT COMMISSION W.N. M W. K. Ku Chief Engineer
51.7. 31 15040
V.O. S G. 2
CC USA
Enclosure
cc: Mr. J. B. Carter, AID/M Mr. G. C. Johnson, MKA
國史饭 Academia Historica
63 :unselected:
